pkgmetadata.longdescription: # IMPORTANT: - The clear command is `clear_linux.clear()` - To import properly, add this line of code `from clear_linux import clear_linux`# Clear Command for LinuxWill clear your terminal output for you with one function# Requirements: - os (default) - time (default) - python 3.7+# Latest Patch Notes: - Updated `README.md` again - **All previous patch notes are availible in version history**
